products.name: Turkish Delight
products.facts: ["Turkish Delight is primarily made from sugar, starch, and water.","It is often flavored with natural ingredients such as rosewater, lemon, or mastic.","The production of Turkish Delight can be eco-friendly if sourced from sustainable sugar and starch suppliers.","High-quality Turkish Delight has a chewy texture and is often dusted with powdered sugar or desiccated coconut."]

products.facts: ["350 g is often used to denote the weight of various packaging materials, including paper and plastic.","Many products weighing 350 g are designed with eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","The quality of items weighing 350 g can vary significantly based on the manufacturing process and material used.","Products at this weight category often aim for a balance between functionality and sustainability, appealing to eco-conscious consumers."]
